colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010B (RLUNG RTA'I GSO BA'I BSANGS @011A *, ,GSOL MCHOD RLUNG RTA'I ME SPOR BA'I RLUNG GA-YAB CES BYA BA, 'DI NI MTHO RIGS THOS PA BSAGS SPYOD LDAN PA THO YON RAB BRTAN CES BGYI BA 'DI LTAR DGOS ZHES GSUNG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, DGE SLONG GI MING TZAM CAN BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN ZHES BYA BA BAG CHAGS BZHAGS NAS BRIS PA SEMS DGE BAS PHYI MA SKYE BA MANG POR SNA TSOGS MKHA' KYIS 'GRO BA'I DON MDZAD PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,DGE'O, ,BKRA SHIS, ,)
